Modelling with continuous responses

Introduction to Statistics with R

Emi Tanaka

19th February 2025

These slides are best viewed on a modern browser like Google Chrome on a desktop or laptop. Some interactive components may require some time to fully load.

Table of contents

  • Case study Seed weight from seed length

Case study Seed weight from seed length

  • Seed length is expected to be a major contributor to differences in seed weight for wheat.
  • 190 seeds selected at random from a line of diploid wheat, Triticum monococcum for length and weight.

Summary

• Symbolic model formulae • F-test • More model diagnostics • Model interpretation
